x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/diagnosticreport-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/DiagnosticReport \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"DiagnosticReport","id":"1473dfe1-9401-49cd-9a6e-a065951deb65","status":"final","code":{"coding":[{"system":"http://loinc.org","code":"38269-7"}],"text":"DXA BONE DENSITOMETRY"},"subject":{"reference":"Patient/pat2"},"effectiveDateTime":"2008-06-17T08:00:00+08:00","issued":"2008-06-18T07:23:00.000+08:00","performer":[{"reference":"Practitioner/3ad0687e-f477-468c-afd5-fcc2bf897809","display":"Dr Henry Seven"}],"result":[{"reference":"Observation/bmd"}],"conclusionCode":[{"coding":[{"system":"http://snomed.info/sct","code":"391040000","display":"At risk of osteoporotic fracture"}]}],"meta":{"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:15.725+08:00"}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
